name: Catholic Charities
description: Catholic Charities has operated multiple programs geared towards ending family homelessness for over 25 years. Over the years, they have adapted their services to ensure that they are meeting the needs of San Francisco’s homeless families. Their essential services include: - Housing and caring for people with HIV/AIDS and other chronic illnesses - Supporting aging adults, adults with disabilities, and immigrants - Providing food and care to seniors and families experiencing homelessness - Giving
